photosynthesis: Njira yomwe zomera zimagwiritsa ntchito kuwala kwa dzuwa, madzi, ndi CO2 kupanga chakudya (glucose)
kupuma kwa ma cell: Njira yomwe ma cell amathyola glucose kuti atulutse mphamvu
mitochondria: Organelles m'maselo omwe amachititsa kupuma kwa ma cell
chlorophyll: Green pigment m'zomera zomwe zimayamwa dzuwa kuti zipange photosynthesis
dna: Deoxyribonucleic acid, molekyulu yonyamula chidziwitso cha majini
rna: Ribonucleic acid, molekyulu yomwe imakhudzidwa ndi kaphatikizidwe ka mapuloteni
mapuloteni: Molekyulu yopangidwa ndi amino acid, yomwe imagwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana za thupi
enzyme: Mapuloteni omwe amafulumizitsa kusintha kwa mankhwala m'thupi
selo: Chigawo choyambirira cha moyo, chomangira cha zamoyo zonse
minofu: Gulu la maselo ofanana amagwira ntchito limodzi kuti agwire ntchito inayake
chiwalo: Gulu la minyewa yogwirira ntchito limodzi kuti igwire ntchito inayake
limba dongosolo: Gulu la ziwalo zogwirira ntchito limodzi kuti zigwire ntchito yovuta
homeostasis: Kutha kwa chamoyo kusunga malo okhazikika amkati
kusintha: Kusintha kwa chamoyo chomwe chimathandiza kuti chikhalepo ndi kuberekana m'malo ake
chisinthiko: Njira yomwe kuchuluka kwa zamoyo kumasintha pakapita nthawi
kusankha kwachilengedwe: Njira yomwe zamoyo zokhala ndi mikhalidwe yogwirizana bwino ndi chilengedwe zimakhala ndi mwayi wopulumuka ndikuberekana
zachilengedwe: Kuphunzira momwe zamoyo zimagwirira ntchito limodzi ndi chilengedwe chawo
chilengedwe: Gulu la zamoyo ndi malo omwe siamoyo amalumikizana wina ndi mnzake
biosphere: Mbali ya Dziko lapansi yomwe imathandizira zamoyo
taxonomy: Nthambi ya biology yokhudzana ndi kugawa zamoyo
morphology: Nthambi ya biology yokhudzana ndi maphunziro a mawonekedwe ndi kapangidwe
physiology: Nthambi ya biology yokhudzana ndi kafukufuku wa ntchito ndi njira zamoyo
autotroph: Zamoyo zomwe zimatha kupanga chakudya chake pogwiritsa ntchito kuwala kapena mankhwala (mwachitsanzo, zomera)
heterotroph: Chamoyo chomwe chimapeza chakudya podya zamoyo zina (mwachitsanzo, nyama)
wopanga: Zamoyo zomwe zimapanga zinthu zachilengedwe (mwachitsanzo, zomera)
wogula: Chamoyo chomwe chimadya zinthu zomwe zimapangidwa ndi zamoyo zina (mwachitsanzo, nyama)
wowola: Chamoyo chomwe chimaphwanya zamoyo zakufa ndi zinthu zamoyo (mwachitsanzo, bowa, mabakiteriya)
chiwerengero cha anthu: Gulu la zamoyo zamtundu womwewo wokhala kudera linalake
mudzi: Gulu la anthu osiyanasiyana omwe amalumikizana wina ndi mnzake mdera linalake
zamoyo: Zachilengedwe zazikulu zokhala ndi zomera ndi nyama zodziwika bwino (monga chipululu, nkhalango yamvula)
zamoyo zosiyanasiyana: Zamoyo zosiyanasiyana Padziko Lapansi pamagulu onse, kuchokera ku majini kupita ku zachilengedwe
pangozi: Mitundu yomwe ili pachiwopsezo cha kutha
